28095.<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>「突: <start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>Don't jump the gun <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28096.<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>「な:

28103.<start_lip_sync n01474 _normal m00001>「わ:

28104.<start_lip_sync n01474 _normal m00001>「…:

28105.<start_lip_sync n01474 _normal m00001>「待:

28107.<start_lip_sync n01474 _normal m00001>「お:

28138.<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>「だ:

28140.<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>「…:

28142.<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>「私:

28144.<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>「父:

28145.<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>「子:

28146.<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>「そ:

28147.<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>「魔:

28148.<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>「父:

28149.<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>「そ: <start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>At the time I just kept thinking...<stop_lip_animation n01473 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28150.<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>「父:

28152.<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>「魔:

28154.<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>「だ:

28155.<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「ノ: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>Noran... It's not true!<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28159.<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>「…:

28165.<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>「母:

28195.<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「生:

28196.<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>「…: <start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>...Is that sufficient, Unaty?<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28198.<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>「衛:

28202.<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>「魔: <start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>I see, its the Armamentalists honor.<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28203.<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>「フ: <start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>Hmph... I have nothing else to say.<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
